text: i've had enough of your condescension. maybe i didn't go to college when i was eleven like you, maybe i got my doctorate at 24 instead of 16, but you are not the only person who is smarter than everyone else in this room. no offense. and i am clearly not the only person who is tormented by insecurity and has an ego in need of constant validation.
